@{ SongTitle = 'Somewhere Down The Road' Artist = 'No One You Know' } | ConvertTo-DDBItem
Get-DDBItem -TableName 'Music' -Key $key | ConvertFrom-DDBItem
Name Value ---- ----- Genre Country Artist No One You Know Price 1.94 CriticRating 9 SongTitle Somewhere Down The Road AlbumTitle Somewhat Famous
example.description: ConvertFrom-DDBItem is used to convert the result of Get-DDBItem from a hashtable of DynamoDB AttributeValues to a hashtable of common types like string and double.
